roleset.name: to formally reject a formerly held belief or statement

example.name: transitive
example.text: Since the last time [0] he traveled this way []several months ago , he has recanted a series of bold forecasts of a recession .
example.arg: Since the last time [0] he traveled this way []several months ago
a series of bold forecasts of a recession

roleset.note: RECANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'recant' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from recant.01-v predicate notes)
